council.n.01: a body serving in an administrative capacity
vote.v.01: express one's preference for a candidate or for a measure or resolution; cast a vote
cannibalize.v.02: use parts of something to repair something else
budget.n.01: a sum of money allocated for a particular purpose
construct.v.01: make by combining materials and parts
garage.n.01: an outbuilding (or part of a building) for housing automobiles
exploit.v.02: draw from; make good use of
opportunity.n.01: a possibility due to a favorable combination of circumstances
teacher.n.01: a person whose occupation is teaching
write.v.07: mark or trace on a surface
board.n.x.0: a surface, frame, or device for writing or posting notices
student.n.01: a learner who is enrolled in an educational institution
solve.v.01: find the solution to (a problem or question) or understand the meaning of
